summary: Provides the command‑line interface for launching training scripts with the Accelerate library, parsing user options, determining the appropriate compute backend (GPU, multi‑GPU, TPU, SageMaker, DeepSpeed, etc.), setting up environment variables, and invoking the target script with the correct launcher.
business_intent: Allow users to start deep‑learning training jobs on diverse hardware platforms through a unified CLI that automatically configures the runtime environment and handles backend‑specific launch mechanics.
